          <title>
            <string language="fr">Changements de la croûte de la Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Changes in the Earth's crust</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Änderungen in der Kruste der Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mudanças na crosta de terra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cambiamenti nella crosta terrestre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αλλαγές στη γήινη κρούστα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cambios en la corteza de tierra</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration prouve qu'il y a beaucoup de processus impliqués dans les changements de la croûte terrestre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that there are many processes involved in causing changes to the Earth's crust.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="fr">collision</string>
            <string language="en">collision</string>
          </keyword>

          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß es viele Prozesse gibt,
die wenn man Änderungen an der Kruste der Masse mit einbezogen 
werden, verursacht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que há muitos processos 
envolvidos em causar mudanças à crosta de terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che ci sono molti 
processi addetti a causare i cambiamenti alla crosta terrestre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι υπάρχουν πολλές 
διαδικασίες που περιλαμβάνονται στην πρόκληση των αλλαγών στη 
γήινη κρούστα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que hay muchos procesos
implicados en causar cambios a la corteza de tierra.</string>
          </description>
